summary.para: Creates a that represents a Content Decryption Module (CDM) for a DRM key system.

param.name: contentDecryptionModuleProperties
param.para: An object containing the properties for the CDM.

remarks.para: The following properties are supported for the contentDecryptionModuleProperties parameter.

| Property |Description |-----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------| | MF_CONTENTDECRYPTIONMODULE_INPRIVATESTOREPATH | A file path representing a storage location the Content Decryption Module (CDM) can use for content-specific data.| | MF_CONTENTDECRYPTIONMODULE_STOREPATH | A file path representing a storage location the Content Decryption Module (CDM) can use for initialization. The path specified with this property will also be used for content-specific data if the MF_CONTENTDECRYPTIONMODULE_INPRIVATESTOREPATH property isn't set. |

summary.para: Returns the supported combination of configuration options.

param.name: configuration
param.para: Receives a reference to an object containing the configuration options for the CDM.

remarks.para: GetConfiguration is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySystemAccess.keySystem.

summary.para: Gets a string identifying the Key System being used by the Content Decryption Module (CDM).

param.name: keySystem
param.para: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR identifying the Key System.

remarks.para: The keySystem memory must be allocated and freed using .
GetKeySystem is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySystemAccess.getConfiguration.

summary.para: Provides access to a media key system.

remarks.para: IMFContentDecryptionModuleAccess is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySystemAccess.
